casebody.data:
No. 09-10582. Cardrick D. Flowers, Petitioner v. Ray Hobbs, Interim Director, Arkansas Department of Correction. 561 U.S. 1015, 130 S. Ct. 3494,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1073,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5127. June 21, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 585 F.3d 413.
